cast.name: 麦迪哈·凯米尔 Madiha Kamel

introduction: The accountant Sharif works in customs and lives with his brother Lutfi. Umneyah gets to know Sharif and offers him a job at her friend Fahmi's company, who plans to remove him from his work due to his strictness and honesty, which hinders the passage of his suspicious operations through the customs. Sharif and Umneyah get married, and it turns out that she is involved with Fahmi in the drug trade. She convinces him to demolish the house and school that he owned with his brother Lutfi to build a huge building. Lutfi refuses, and Sharif succeeds in admitting him to a mental hospital.
